H0.text: What is the name of the helicopter used to transport the President of the United States. VH-3D Sea King

H1.text: What is the name of the helicopter used to transport the President of the United States. VH-60N White Hawk

H2.text: What is the name of the helicopter used to transport the President of the United States. UH-1N Iroquois

H3.text: What is the name of the helicopter used to transport the President of the United States. Marine I

A4.text: The current fleet is made up of the VH-3D, the VH-60N 'Whitehawk', the VH-92, and the MV-22.

A5.text: In the late 1970s, the VH-3As were retired and replaced by the upgraded VH-3D.
